item.description:
Free Meet & Greet @ Anthony's of Malden, starts @ 7pm with free Hor's Douevres, then if you want to Dance the night away to the Joe Vellucci Band & DJ, on one of the largest dance floors around. Join us upstairs $10 cover till 9 pm and $12 after.
For a chance to win free entry upstairs, email us @ WhatsAngeloDoing@comcast.net.
The winners name will be posted at the front door and you and a guest will be free.
This is always a fun crowd who likes to party, so I hope to see you there.
Angelo
And don't forget to check out our future events @ www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com
item.name: WhatsAngeloDoing.com March Meetup
